question: When a raid was made by Congress Volunteers on Dharsana Salt Depot, Mahatma Gandhi was present at which of the following places?
explanation: On 21 May 1930, Sarojini Naidu, Imam Sahib, and Manilal took up the task of leading a raid on Dharsana salt works. When a raid was made by Congress Volunteers on Dharsana salt depot Mahatma Gandhi was in Yervada Jail.
